channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Not all Hot Jupiters orbit solo

item.title: Researchers identify three psychological profiles that could determine the evolution of mental, cognitive and brain health in aging

item.title: Super-Earth vs. Sub-Neptune? The winner is Super-Venus!

item.title: Migration memory: How caribou adapt to changing winter conditions

item.title: DNA damage can last unrepaired for years, changing our view of mutations

item.title: Could this fundamental discovery revolutionize fertilizer use in farming?
item.description: Researchers have discovered a biological mechanism that makes plant roots more welcoming to beneficial soil microbes.
